Event.Description: Uploads the file(s) selected in the currently active explorer window to the FTP server defined in FTP profile 1. Make sure to configure the FTP profile with your FTP login data.
Uploads the file(s) selected in the currently active file dialog window to the FTP server defined in FTP profile 1. Make sure to configure the FTP profile with your FTP login data.

Action.Text: Enter parameters. Paths might need`n to be enclosed in double quotes.
Action.Title: Enter Parameters

Trigger.Description: Runs an executable file with parameters
Trigger.Name: Run with parameters...

Trigger.Description: Opens a dialog for batch image conversion.
Trigger.Name: Convert Images

Trigger.Description: Opens a dialog that displays MD5 checksums of the selected files.
Trigger.Name: MD5 Checksum(s)

Trigger.Description: Uploads the selected files to an FTP server
Trigger.Name: Upload

Trigger.Description: Toggles the visibility of hidden files
Trigger.Name: Toggle hidden files

Action.Text: What type of timer would you like to start?
Action.Title: Dynamic timer

Action.Type: Open folder in new window / tab

Trigger.Description: Shows the contents of the selected folders in a flat view.
Trigger.Name: Flat View

Trigger.Description: Opens the batch rename/replace dialog to replace parts of the filenames of the selected files.
Trigger.Name: Replace in filenames

Trigger.Description: Opens the batch rename/replace dialog to batch-replace text in the selected files.
Trigger.Name: Replace in file contents

Action.Type: Move Slide Window out of screen

Event.Description: This event allows to paste an AutoHotkey script in a dialog and runs it afterwards. This event requires that you have installed an AutoHotkey interpreter and assigned it to the .ahk file extension. The script file is deleted when 7plus exits. This event can be used as a template for other scripting languages.
Event.Name: Run temporary AHK script

Event.Description: This event sends an opening bracket character when NumpadEnd is pressed (Numpad1 with NumLock OFF). This remapping is used to enter equations into scientific calculators using only the numpad.
Event.Name: NumpadEnd -> '('

Event.Description: This event sends a closing bracket character when NumpadPgDn is pressed (Numpad3 with NumLock OFF). This remapping is used to enter equations into scientific calculators using only the numpad.
Event.Name: NumpadPgDn -> ')'

Event.Description: This event sends a '^' character when NumpadHome is pressed (Numpad7 with NumLock OFF). This remapping is used to enter equations into scientific calculators using only the numpad.
Event.Name: NumpadHome -> '^'

Event.Description: This event sends a sqrt( string when NumpadPgUp is pressed Numpad9 with NumLock OFF). This remapping is used to enter equations into scientific calculators using only the numpad.
Event.Name: NumpadPgUp -> "sqrt("

Event.Description: This event sends a '=' character when NumpadIns is pressed (Numpad0 with NumLock OFF). This remapping is used to enter equations into scientific calculators using only the numpad.
Event.Name: NumpadIns -> '='

Event.Description: This event runs a google search for the selected text.
Event.Name: Search selected text with Google
